Maven Googlecode changes support

Project Documentation

googlecode-changes:create-report

Full name:

com.googlecode.maven-googlecode-changes-plugin:maven-googlecode-changes-plugin:1.1-SNAPSHOT:create-report

Description:

Create a report based on a googlecode issues.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
issueTypes Map - Mapping between changes.xml action types and googlecode issue types. All your own Trackers fields should be mapped to one of: add, fix, remove, update.
milestone String - Project version.
Default value is: ${project.version}.
projectIdentifier String - Project identifier.
Default value is: ${project.artifactId}.
xmlPath File - Path of the changes.xml that will be generated.
Default value is: ${basedir}/target/generated-changes/changes.xml.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
password String - Password used to log in googlecode.
username String - Username used to log in googlecode.

Parameter Details

issueTypes:

Mapping between changes.xml action types and googlecode issue types. All your own Trackers fields should be mapped to one of: add, fix, remove, update.
  • Type: java.util.Map
  • Required: Yes

milestone:

Project version.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${milestone}
  • Default: ${project.version}

password:

Password used to log in googlecode.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${googlecodePassword}

projectIdentifier:

Project identifier.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${projectIdentifier}
  • Default: ${project.artifactId}

username:

Username used to log in googlecode.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${googlecodeUsername}

xmlPath:

Path of the changes.xml that will be generated.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${xmlPath}
  • Default: ${basedir}/target/generated-changes/changes.xml
